game.name: Berserk Warrior: Infinite Roguelike
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Roguelike 2.5D action game about defeating monsters and bosses with soulslike mechanics. Your character is a Sword Warrior and you can choose permanent and temporary upgrades as you play and infinite upgrades with each attempt.
